mapper.insert:
select seq_db_tag.nextval from dual
insert into db_tag (id, category, count, name, url, page, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{page,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update db_tag set category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page = #{page,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, category, count, name, url, page, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at from db_tag order by id desc

update.foreach:
update db_tag
category=#{item.category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count=#{item.count,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
name=#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url=#{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page=#{item.page,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

updated_at=#{item.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR}
